Those pid values would be used anytime you use path planner aka follow a path. When our \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePID\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Proportional Integral Derivative\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e was to high we
